video.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager
video.synopsis: After an unplanned pregnancy transforms her life, 15-year-old Amy Juergens continues her education and pursues a turbulent romance with a classmate.

episodes.synopsis: Fifteen-year-old Amy finds her life turned upside down when she discovers that she's pregnant.
episodes.title: Falling in Love

episodes.synopsis: Ricky continues to look for more from his relationship with Amy, and Ben reveals his feelings for her.
episodes.title: You Are My Everything

episodes.synopsis: Amy is afraid that her secret may be revealed to her parents when her mother has a run-in with Amy's doctor.
episodes.title: I Feel Sick

episodes.synopsis: As Amy and Ben's relationship grows stronger, Grace becomes involved in a scandal.
episodes.title: Caught

episodes.synopsis: Ben shocks Amy with a question. Later, Amy makes a decision about her pregnancy.
episodes.title: What Have You Done to Me?

episodes.synopsis: Amy reveals her secret to her mother, and Grace hopes to persuade Amy to make a choice.
episodes.title: Love for Sale

episodes.synopsis: Amy considers a change in her living situation. Meanwhile, Ricky struggles to accept responsibility for his actions.
episodes.title: Absent

episodes.synopsis: Amy's grandmother visits and wants to help. Elsewhere, Adrian flaunts her new friendship with Grace.
episodes.title: Your Cheatin' Heart

episodes.synopsis: George uses Adrian's apartment so he doesn't have to tell Amy and Ashley that he's living at the furniture store.
episodes.title: Slice of Life

episodes.synopsis: Amy decides on her future school plans, and Adrian's mother encourages her to have a relationship with her father.
episodes.title: Back to School Special

episodes.synopsis: Adrian is missing, which prompts her dad to get involved in her life.
episodes.title: Just Say No

episodes.synopsis: After Anne informs Amy that she must get a job to support her baby, Ben and Amy make a rushed decision that could change their lives.
episodes.title: The Secret Wedding of the American Teenager

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Amy's marriage is revealed to their parents, which leads to a brief reconciliation between Anne and George.
episodes.title: Baked Nevada

episodes.synopsis: Ricky's father comes to town with a plan for his son and the baby.
episodes.title: The Father and the Son

episodes.synopsis: Amy has a chance to learn her baby's gender. Elsewhere, while Jack is finishing his community service, he spots Bob possibly violating his parole.
episodes.title: That's Enough of That

episodes.synopsis: As Amy and Ricky discuss adoption, George is approached by his co-worker about adopting Amy's baby.
episodes.title: Chocolate Cake

episodes.synopsis: Ben tells Amy he'd like some space, and Amy's parents interview potential adoptive parents for the baby.
episodes.title: Unforgiven

episodes.synopsis: Ricky attempts to sabotage the adoption. Meanwhile, Ashley tries to persuade Ben to return to Amy.
episodes.title: Making Up Is Hard to Do

episodes.synopsis: A potential job opportunity opens up for Anne, Adrian attempts to change her style, and Jack raises money for underprivileged children.
episodes.title: Money for Nothing, Chicks for Free

episodes.synopsis: Amy's friends lend a hand by coming up with a plan concerning her decision about the baby.
episodes.title: Maybe Baby

episodes.synopsis: Adrian and Grace plan Amy's baby shower. While setting up for the party, Jack and Grace share a moment.
episodes.title: Whoomp! (There It Is)

episodes.synopsis: As she goes into labor, Amy flashes back to the first time she met Ricky.
episodes.title: One Night at Band Camp

episodes.synopsis: Amy's baby is born, but she has a hard time adjusting to full-time motherhood. Elsewhere, George and Ashley move out.
episodes.title: And Unto Us, A Child Is Born

episodes.synopsis: Amy struggles to balance her life as a new mother and high school student. Meanwhile, Grace makes a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: The Big One

episodes.synopsis: Grace believes that her actions are to blame for her father's death, and Ben tries to find his place in Amy's life.
episodes.title: What's Done Is Done

episodes.synopsis: Ricky intervenes when Grace isolates herself from friends and family, and Adrian is blamed for Grace's decision.
episodes.title: Par for the Course

episodes.synopsis: George and Ashley attempt to help Amy with her hectic schedule. Meanwhile, Ben makes his plans for the summer.
episodes.title: Ciao

episodes.synopsis: Grace reveals a secret, and Amy tries to find a way to accompany Ben on his trip.
episodes.title: Born Free

episodes.synopsis: As Ben prepares to leave for his trip without Amy, she realizes that her summer will be filled with work and school.
episodes.title: The Summer of Our Discontent

episodes.synopsis: Everyone returns from summer vacation, and George shocks Anne with a big revelation.
episodes.title: Summertime

episodes.synopsis: Adrian tries to push George and Anne together, but her motivation is selfish.
episodes.title: A New Kind of Green

episodes.synopsis: When the fighting between Adrian and Amy escalates, Ricky intervenes.
episodes.title: Hot Nuts

episodes.synopsis: Amy tries to keep Ben interested in her. Meanwhile, Grace makes an impression on Adrian.
episodes.title: Knocked Up, Who's There?

episodes.synopsis: Amy is jealous when Ashley gets a new room in the garage. Elsewhere, Ricky pursues Adrian -- but she claims to have moved on.
episodes.title: Cramped

episodes.synopsis: Grace and Jack hit a roadblock in their relationship. Meanwhile, Amy and Ben try to patch things up.
episodes.title: Be My, Be My Baby

episodes.synopsis: Most of the gang ditches school, causing the new counselor to chase them down. Meanwhile, Anne and Amy take off on a mother-daughter vacation.
episodes.title: You Don't Know What You've Got

episodes.synopsis: Anne runs into an ex-boyfriend -- and Amy is attracted to his son. Elsewhere, Ashley and Griffin have a sleepover.
episodes.title: Til It's Gone

episodes.synopsis: Ricky and Adrian get into a fight about money, and Amy and Ben attempt to resolve their relationship problems.
episodes.title: Loved and Lost

episodes.synopsis: Grace begins a campaign that takes over the school. Meanwhile, Adrian continues her attempts to befriend Amy.
episodes.title: Just Say Me

episodes.synopsis: George tries to win Anne back, Ben and Grace connect, and Amy goes on a date with Jimmy.
episodes.title: The Second Time Around

episodes.synopsis: Amy is concerned when Jimmy doesn't call, so she seeks Ricky's help. Meanwhile, Anne tries get a handle on her relationship with George.
episodes.title: Let's Try That Again

episodes.synopsis: On the night of the dance, gossip is spreading like wildfire, causing some surprising revelations.
episodes.title: The Rhythm of Life

episodes.synopsis: Amy visits Jimmy to find out why he never called. Elsewhere, Adrian makes a confession to Ricky.
episodes.title: Mistakes Were Made

episodes.synopsis: Ricky confronts his mother about his abusive childhood. Meanwhile, George tries to update his look with a makeover.
episodes.title: Choices

episodes.synopsis: Ricky, Ben, Amy and Adrian try to work out all their differences for John's sake.
episodes.title: Good Girls and Boys

episodes.synopsis: Ricky seeks George's assistance in getting joint custody, causing Amy to retaliate.
episodes.title: I Got You, Babe

episodes.synopsis: John's first birthday arrives, and Adrian harbors a big secret.
episodes.title: Ben There, Done That

episodes.synopsis: In the season opener, Adrian copes with the news from last season, and Ben confesses his love for Amy.
episodes.title: Do Over

episodes.synopsis: Amy is accepted into a music program but fears she can't attend because it's in New York City. Elsewhere, Jack continues looking for a place to live.
episodes.title: Accentuate the Positive

episodes.synopsis: Everyone rallies around Amy so she can attend the music program. Meanwhile, Ben continues to hide his secret from her.
episodes.title: Get Out of Town

episodes.synopsis: Ricky moves into the Juergens house to take care of John while Amy is away, but her parents are concerned about the growing bond between Ricky and Ashley.
episodes.title: Goodbye, Amy Juergens

episodes.synopsis: Ruben disagrees with Adrian's decision; Jack and Tom bond over brownies; and Amy discovers that the music program is for teen mothers when Bristol Palin shows up at her dorm.
episodes.title: Which Way Did She Go?

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is learning about Adrian's decision -- except Amy, whom Ben still hasn't told.
episodes.title: She Went That A'way

episodes.synopsis: Ben heads to New York City to visit Amy and tell her the news. Meanwhile, Ricky bonds with his mother.
episodes.title: New York, New York

episodes.synopsis: Amy reaches out to Adrian, Ricky asks Ruben for help, and George plans a romantic date with Anne.
episodes.title: The Sounds of Silence

episodes.synopsis: Ashley is torn between her feelings for Ricky and Grant. Meanwhile, Grace plays matchmaker for Griffin.
episodes.title: Chicken Little

episodes.synopsis: Ricky visits Amy in New York City, and Ben accompanies Adrian to her sonogram appointment.
episodes.title: My Girlfriend's Back

episodes.synopsis: Ben gets fired from the butcher shop after an altercation with Ricky, and Amy goes to a nightclub in New York City.
episodes.title: Lady Liberty

episodes.synopsis: Everyone forgets Amy's birthday, and Adrian goes to the hospital for an emergency examination.
episodes.title: Sweet and Sour

episodes.synopsis: Ricky agrees to take Amy on a date to see whether there are still sparks between them. Elsewhere, Grace and Grant spend the night together.
episodes.title: Up All Night

episodes.synopsis: Anne and Amy suspect that George is cheating again; Ricky and Amy go on a date; and Grant and Grace get ready for camp.
episodes.title: Rules of Engagement

episodes.synopsis: Ricky has a surprise visitor show up on his doorstep, and Adrian and Ben find out the sex of the baby.
episodes.title: Who Do You Trust?

episodes.synopsis: Ben considers proposing to Adrian, while Grace and Grant discuss next steps in their relationship.
episodes.title: Mirrors

episodes.synopsis: Ashley continues with her homeschooling and Ben proposes.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Not Coming to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: George is lonely without Anne and shows interest in Ricky's mom, while Lauren finds out something about her parents.
episodes.title: Another Proposal

episodes.synopsis: Ashley studies with another homeschooled student to help her studying habits, while George attempts to take Ricky's mom out on a date, not realizing she is already dating someone.
episodes.title: Deeper and Deeper

episodes.synopsis: Ricky is hesitant about Amy moving in and tries to find a way out.
episodes.title: Moving in and Out

episodes.synopsis: Ricky puts pressure on Amy to make a decision, while Adrian continues to make plans for her wedding.
episodes.title: Young at Heart

episodes.synopsis: Ben tries to defend Adrian, but in doing so, he hurts his friendship with Amy.
episodes.title: Loose Lips

episodes.synopsis: The fighting continues leading up to Adrian's baby shower.
episodes.title: Round II

episodes.synopsis: Adrian and Ben both have second thoughts about their upcoming wedding, while George continues meddling in his daughters' lives.
episodes.title: It's Not Over Till It's Over

episodes.synopsis: Amy gets mad when Ricky lets Jack use his apartment, while Adrian is getting nervous about the baby.
episodes.title: To Be..

episodes.synopsis: Adrian and Ben go to the hospital in preparation for the baby, while Amy and Ricky get closer.
episodes.title: ... Or Not To Be

episodes.synopsis: Adrian is depressed and not leaving the house, while Amy decides to make changes in her living situation.
episodes.title: When One Door Opens

episodes.synopsis: Ashley continues her trip, and Betty tries to get Adrian to open up about her feelings.
episodes.title: Another One Closes

episodes.synopsis: Grace has a secret from her recent trip, and Ben continues to make his feelings about Adrian known to everyone but Adrian.
episodes.title: When Opportunity Knocks

episodes.synopsis: George gives Ashley an ultimatum about returning home, while Amy is convinced John is sick.
episodes.title: One Foot Out the Door

episodes.synopsis: Adrian decides to empty out the nursery to help deal with her feelings, which causes Ben and Adrian to get into a huge fight.
episodes.title: Hole in the Wall

episodes.synopsis: Ricky has an interview with a local college but it doesn't go as planned, and Kathleen decides to play a prank on Grace.
episodes.title: Don't Go in There!

episodes.synopsis: Grace tries to fit in to Daniel's college world, while Amy attempts to help Ricky get into college.
episodes.title: Cute

episodes.synopsis: Jack scrambles to find a date for the senior dance, and Amy tries to convince Ricky to take her to the dance.
episodes.title: Dancing with the Stars

episodes.synopsis: Adrian changes her mind about Ben and sets her targets on someone else.
episodes.title: Flip Flop

episodes.synopsis: Amy is upset with Ricky over a voicemail, and Grace offers to set Adrian up with one of Daniel's friends.
Amy wants Ricky to propose, but Ricky has plans of his own.
episodes.title: The Games We Play

episodes.synopsis: George thinks Nora and Anne are getting too close, while Jack uses a school project to get close to Grace again.
episodes.title: Pomp

episodes.synopsis: Grace helps Jack with his graduation speech, Ben takes Adrian out to celebrate, and Ricky's graduation speech has a surprise for Amy.
episodes.title: And Circumstance

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Dylan get closer, and Amy reveals she isn't in a rush to get married.
episodes.title: Smokin' Like a Virgin

episodes.synopsis: Amy decides to go to summer school instead of work, while Dylan and Ben, after getting caught by their parents, are forbidden from seeing each other.
episodes.title: Defiance

episodes.synopsis: Not knowing all that went on between them, Amy, Lauren and Madison's dads arrange a dinner for their daughters in hopes they can work out their disagreements.
episodes.title: They Gotta Eat

episodes.synopsis: George is convinced Anne has feelings for someone close to him, and Grace is anxious for her mother's return.
episodes.title: Suddenly Last Summer

episodes.synopsis: George and Kathleen bond at the "beach" and Dylan and her friends join Ben at school.
episodes.title: The Beach Is Back

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Dylan go on their first official date, and Tom gets into trouble with the law.
episodes.title: The Splits

episodes.synopsis: Kathleen tries to bribe Grace into speaking with Jacob, while Dylan tries to bond with Adrian.
episodes.title: Strange Familiar

episodes.synopsis: The guidance counselor warns Amy she is failing out of summer school, which prompts George to step in and help her study, along with giving her advice on other matters.
episodes.title: Allies

episodes.synopsis: Amy sets a date for the wedding, which spreads like wildfire, along with a rumor about Anne.
episodes.title: The Text Best Thing

episodes.synopsis: With all the rumors spreading, Amy is the center of attention, which causes Grace to become jealous of her. Anne and Ashley finally return from Europe.
episodes.title: 4snp

episodes.synopsis: Anne shares some news with her family, and Ben gets a tour of Dylan's school to decide if he wants to transfer.
episodes.title: Love Is Love

episodes.synopsis: Ricky and Amy take off, possibly to elope, and only George knows the secret.
episodes.title: To Begin With..

episodes.synopsis: Grace continues to shun Adrian, while Amy and Ricky return from eloping.
episodes.title: Shotgun

episodes.synopsis: Amy is asked to mentor a new student, and Leo offers Ricky a full-time job after he graduates.
episodes.title: I Do and I Don't..

episodes.synopsis: Everybody has their own ideas on what kind of wedding should be thrown for Amy and Ricky.
episodes.title: Lies and Byes

episodes.synopsis: At Ricky's first day of college he runs into an old friend, and Ben finds out he is off the hook for the school fire.
episodes.title: Past History

episodes.synopsis: Grace convinces almost everyone to go to church, but it doesn't work out as planned.
episodes.title: Holy Rollers

episodes.synopsis: Amy encourages Kathy to make new friends, but she falls into the wrong crowd.
episodes.title: Girlfriends

episodes.synopsis: Amy is jealous of Ricky's new life at college.
episodes.title: Setting Things Straight

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Amy have a heart-to-heart about the status of their relationship.
episodes.title: Property Not for Sale

episodes.synopsis: Omar and Adrian discuss moving in together, and Anne begins to plan Amy's wedding.
episodes.title: Regrets

episodes.synopsis: Jack is still in the hospital, and Ricky confides in George about the wedding.
episodes.title: Half Over

episodes.synopsis: The gang find themselves celebrating Christmas at a toy warehouse when Kathy suddenly goes into labor. Meanwhile, Grace wishes for a Christmas miracle with Jack.
episodes.title: Hedy's Happy Holiday House

episodes.synopsis: Not everyone likes the wedding dress Amy found, while Kathy is conflicted about returning home.
episodes.title: To Each Her Own

episodes.synopsis: Ricky and Amy confide in Dr. Fields about their feelings on the future, while Jack makes a decision about his future career.
episodes.title: It's a Miracle

episodes.synopsis: George tells Amy that it is time to come clean about the marriage, while Grace tries to take over the wedding plans since Anne is preoccupied.
episodes.title: Untying the Knot

episodes.synopsis: Amy heads to NY to tour a college campus, and Ricky is confused about his feelings for Clementine.
episodes.title: Shiny and New

episodes.synopsis: After the shooting Jack finally reaches out to Dr. Fields, while Nora upsets Ricky when she implies he can raise John on his own.
episodes.title: Fraid So

episodes.synopsis: Amy tries to figure out the financials of going to Hudson, and a lawyer reaches out to Jack about suing the school.
episodes.title: Money For Nothin'

episodes.synopsis: Ben offers to help find an apartment for Ricky, John and Amy to all live together in New York, but Ricky isn't thrilled with the idea of living with Ben.
episodes.title: Interference

episodes.synopsis: Kathleen's mother arrives to stay with them, while Grace and Jack have an announcement to make.
episodes.title: First and Last

episodes.synopsis: Ricky is upset when he finds out the real reason behind Amy's choice of wedding day.
episodes.title: All My Sisters With Me

episodes.synopsis: Leo offers an apartment in NY to Ricky and Amy, but Amy isn't sure about living in the same building as Ben.
episodes.title: When Bad Things Happen to Bad People

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that Anne tried to convince Amy to go to NY alone, Ricky gives Amy an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Caught in a Trap

episodes.synopsis: In the series finale, decisions about the future are made by everyone as graduation day approaches.
episodes.title: Thank You and Goodbye
